name: El Alamein '42
summary: El Alamein '42 covers the epic desert battles of 1942 in North Africa, when Rommel and the Afrika Korps were at their high water mark after the capture of Tobruk. Turning the Afrika Korps back east, Rommel was to be denied the ultimate victory in the desert at a lonely, unheard of railroad stop known as El Alamein.
info:
• 开发: HPS Simulations
  • 游戏类型: Strategy
  • 售价: $49.95
